document_data.name: Cosmas Indicopleustes
document_data.mainbody: '''Cosmas Indicopleustes''' was a notable merchant traveling the [[Hordelands]] in [[1358 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Cosmas was honest, but didn't let that particular trait impede his craftiness.
document_data.Appearance: Because of his obese frame, Cosmas was constantly sweaty.
document_data.Activities: Cosmas invested heavily in a particular caravan, hoping his gamble would pay handsomely. Since he borrowed much of the [[gold]] needed to fund his expedition, he worried about anything interfering with the caravan's success.
